mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Recognition", "Public Opinion Poll", "Refreshment Time", "Try An Old Time Dance", "The 4th Canadian National", "Class Structure", "Working With Special Groups", "Scholarship Fund", "Spotlight A Label: Red Boot", "Film", "The 32nd National Convention" and "Index 1983." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Advanced Dancing", "Contra Corner", "Mostly Modular", "Experimental Notes", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
